data.title: Larry Miller Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Larry Miller with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Was a music major in college and became the drummer for the Comic Strip comedy club in New York after graduation

Big break came when he appeared as an arrogant salesman in Pretty Woman

Is frequently cast in films directed by Christopher Guest (Best in Show; A Mighty Wind; For Your Consideration)

Appeared in both the film and TV versions of 10 Things I Hate About You

Published his first book, Spoiled Rotten America, in 2007

Is a contributing humorist for the Huffington Post and the Weekly Standard

Records a weekly podcast called This Week With Larry Miller

Was named by Comedy Central as one of the top 100 stand-up comedians of all time
